mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member_info(memberno, taste1, taste2) VALUES (#{memberno}, #{taste1}, #{taste2})
mapper.select: SELECT r.memberno, r.id as r_id, r.nickname as r_nickname, r.tel as r_tel, r.email as r_email, r.gradeno as r_gradeno, r.mdate as r_mdate, c.taste1, c.taste2 FROM member r, member_info c WHERE r.memberno = #{r.memberno } and c.memberno = #{c.memberno } ORDER BY memberno ASC
